'''''Now That's What You Call the Four Winds!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VII]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must use a {{Cryo}}, {{Pyro}}, {{Electro}}, and {{Hydro}} attack each to destroy Windbite Bullets in a fight against the [[Setekh Wenut]].
